author: ghugo83
body:
Similar trick as in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33101, to have touchable detector category search stop at first occurrence.

**Validation:
Entire touchable tree is identical between DDD and DD4hep. Validation comparison was made on the entire touchable catalogues.**

@civanch @cvuosalo @ianna
title: Touchables: can stop search at first occurence with DD4hep
